p: Other therapeutic options, with lower chances of success—according to the WHO—are monoclonal or polyclonal antibodies, or serum collected from patients with SARS-COV-2, which contains antibodies against infection ( 25). However, a study involving plasma harvested from patients cured of SARS-COV-2 and its administration in severe cases of pulmonary disease has been initiated—in which a few cases of clinical remission have been described ( 81).
